dialog.text: I have been trying to write a reflection all morning for LO1.1.1.3.  Examples of good communication - not in my team!  Tanya has been going on about how we should all be pulling all-nighters and stuff.  Who wants to do that!  Pete would go nuts if I spend all night on the computer.  You making any progress?

joins.text: Sounds like you know what you are doing.  I'm going to ask Jordan or Alexander in second year for some help.
Ah well, perhaps we can get Jordan or Alexander in second year to help us?

dialog.text: Really struggling with finding decent resources - why can't they just give notes!  Lunch time calls :smiley:
